## MatchChunk interface

A chunk of the reference string that matched or not

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MatchChunk 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [matched](./finder-string-similarity-score.matchchunk.matched.md) | boolean | Flag that indicates if this piece of text is matched by the input string |
